column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I went for the second or third time last week. Wasn't impressed with the quality of the soup. For me
column2: the actual broth is important and mine wasn't as hot as it should be. Heat wise
column3: not mentioning spice. The egg was whole. I am used to it being cut in half. Maybe I'm nitpicking. Service was great. Our waiter was very timely and quick to serve our food and drinks.
